channel.title: Yet Another Iteration
channel.description: Recent content on Yet Another Iteration

item.title: About
item.description: Giuliano Sposito Myself Computer Engineer and Master in Strategic Management of Technological Innovation, both by Unicamp, and with a specialization in Data Science. Senior Manager at CI&T, current working as Lean Digital Consulting. My Job Innovation is now everyone’s business. If you are a manager in a global company, an entrepreneur starting your business, a team leader, or even a developer within a development team, it is expected that you do more and better with fewer resources (Get Lean!

item.title: We have a blog!
item.description: It’s just a place to put my ideas and thoughts on the topics that I like and I get involved in everyday life, especially about software development, agility, lean production and data science. The same blog is an experience with R (my current favorite language), created using pages written in RMarkdown and converted to a site using Blogdown and Hugo, versioned in GitHub and published in Netlify.
